name: zenith-focus-timer
description: A minimalist timer app to help you focus, breathe, and relax. Features customizable durations and optional chime sounds for a serene experience.

scripts.build: if exist dist rmdir /s /q dist && mkdir dist && esbuild index.tsx --bundle --outfile=dist/index.js --jsx=automatic --format=esm --platform=browser --external:react --external:react-dom/client && copy index.html dist\index.html && copy manifest.json dist\manifest.json && copy metadata.json dist\metadata.json
